skills.name: Blossoming Fire Lotus
skills.description: Nezha deals 200% ATK as DMG to enemies within 3 meters. Enters the [Lotus Embodied] state, gaining 15% Lifesteal, enhancing other skills, and dealing 90% ATK as DMG per sec to enemies within 3 meters.

upgrades.level2: Lotus Embodied reduces the Armor of nearby enemies by 10% for 2s. This effect can stack.
upgrades.level4: The duration of Lotus Embodied extends to 15s.

skills.name: Lotus Ward
skills.description: Blesses two frontline allies with Soul Fire at combat start (Passive), increasing ATK by 10% and Armor & M-RES by 30% until the battle ends. When any of them falls, Nezha retrieves Soul Fire.

upgrades.level2: Soul Fire now grants 20% ATK and 40% Armor & M-RES.
upgrades.level3: Gains a shield equal to 200% of ATK when retrieving Soul Fire.
upgrades.level4: Soul Fire now grants 30% ATK and 50% Armor & M-RES.

skills.name: Windfire Charge
skills.description: Charges towards the enemy with the highest ATK, dealing DMG equal to 80% of ATK to the target and all enemies along the path. While in the [Lotus Embodied] state, deals DMG equal to 120% of ATK to the target and enemies along the path and knocks them down.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 100% ATK. DMG is increased to 140% ATK in the [Lotus Embodied] state.
upgrades.level3: Increases ATK by 25% while in Lotus Embodied.
upgrades.level4: Increases ATK SPD by 25% for 10s when the skill ends.

skills.name: Armillary Coil
skills.description: Whips Cosmic Sash to pull 2 nearest enemies within 1 meter and sweeps with Fire-Tipped Spear to deal DMG equal to 100% of ATK. He deals DMG equal to 160% of ATK and knocks down enemies while in the [Lotus Embodied] state.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 120% ATK. DMG is increased to 180% ATK in the [Lotus Embodied] state.
upgrades.level3: Enemies hit by Nezha in the [Lotus Embodied] state take 20% more DMG from him for 8s.
upgrades.level4: He can now pull up to 3 enemies.

relic.name: Rage of Reincarnation
relic.description: Whenever an ally (excluding minions) falls in battle, Nezha restores 150 Energy, increases DMG dealt by 15%, and reduces DMG taken by 10% for 25s. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

upgrades.level2: Whenever an ally (excluding minions) falls in battle, Nezha restores 150 Energy, increases DMG dealt by 30%, and reduces DMG taken by 10% for 25s. This effect can stack up to 5 times.
upgrades.level3: Whenever an ally (excluding minions) falls in battle, Nezha restores 150 Energy, increases DMG dealt by 30%, and reduces DMG taken by 25% for 25s. This effect can stack up to 5 times.
upgrades.level4: Gains 300 bonus Energy and increases Energy Regen by 30% at combat start.
